content.rendered:
Sarah Bailey

Accountant

Sarah is an Arkansas native and has lived in the greater Little Rock area for over 50 years. Her professional experience is in accounting, predominantly in the hospitality industry, having worked as a property-level controller at four hotels spanning over 14 years. Sarah accepted the opportunity with the EAC in December of 2020 and has doggedly explored how new tools can best help control costs and achieve the EAC’s goals in an ever-changing landscape. She hopes to continue to contribute towards the success of the EAC, which she sees as a progressive model that prepares our students and our state for both challenges and opportunities and ensures a bright future for UA Little Rock.
